summary: Wynyard Station is the start of our journey for those that caught the B1. This station is a major CBD transport hub and provides easy access to trains, buses, and is within walking distance of many city attractions.

details.heading: Wynyard Station
details.content:
Wynyard Station is a key transport interchange in Sydney's CBD, connecting commuters to various parts of the city.

  • Major train and bus hub
  • Located in Sydney CBD
  • Close to city attractions

Check transport information on the Transport for NSW website.
